sent.orig: EMERGE is a program that analyzes well log and seismic data.
sent.trans: EMERGE是一个分析测井曲线和地震资料的程序。

sent.orig: Today, a new Dubai has a chance to emerge: leaner, meaner and better.
sent.trans: 如今，一个新迪拜有了一个重新亮相的机会：变得更加削瘦、更加低调，也更为美好。

sent.orig: In recent years, adverse effect of excessive indrawn FDI has begun to emerge.
sent.trans: 近些年来，大量引资的负面效应开始显现。

sent.orig: The faithful will walk through streams of fire and emerge unscathed.
sent.trans: 信念能使人行走在火焰的洪流中并毫发无伤。

sent.orig: Is it possible that a new bourgeoisie will emerge?
sent.trans: 会不会产生新的资产阶级？
